title: Rock Shox Domain suspension fork provides big travel without spending big dollars
content:
Looks like the ZEB is getting a little brother. New to the Rock Shox family, the Domain adds another fork with a 38mm chassis to the ranks, but this time with an eye on affordability. Like the ZEB, the Domain uses a massive 38mm chassis to address the needs of more aggressive enduro bikes and [â€¦]

The post Rock Shox Domain suspension fork provides big travel without spending big dollars appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
